a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball V

p.k: The Uncle / The Heist / The Petals When Gumball finds out that their 8-bit friend Ocho has an Italian plumber called Mario for an uncle he assumes it’s ‘that’ Mario and says he’ll do anything to meet him. / Richard discovers that going into a bank whilst wearing a motorcycle helmet can land you in a lot of trouble. / When Leslie's petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him.
